game.name: Air Hunter
game.shortDescription: Air Hunter is a challenging game with stunning graphics where you pilot a fighter aircraft, destroy enemies, and dodge obstacles. Unlimited bullets ensure non-stop action as you aim to become the ultimate air hunter.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Air Hunter is a challenging game with stunning graphics where you pilot a fighter aircraft, destroy enemies, and dodge obstacles. Unlimited bullets ensure non-stop action as you aim to become the ultimate air hunter.

reviewHighlights.text: looks like a mobile game but it's still kinda fine
